bobbleAI - AI Engineer

Location - remote, Work Type: Full Time

It July 01, 2022

Required Educational Qualifications

A graduate from Tier I & Tier II college preferably in Computer Science. Preference for Masters with a concentration in Data Sciences.

Required Experience:

At least 2+ years post Bachelors Or at least one internship post/during Masters in Data Science/AI Roles Or passionate people who have contributed to opensource projects/Kaggle/Github.

What you will be doing here -

  • Automates data gathering, cleaning, and maintainance and decide on features from across domains that play pivotal roles in building ML solutions.
  • Train ML models from prototype to production, with incremental improvements.
  • Closely analyse the platform and all forms of data generated, and propose data collection adhering to strict data policies in place.
  • Keep up to date with the latest developments in the AI including but not limited to Machine Learning, for proposing potential improvements on existing products.
  • Write scripts on a regular basis for data exploration and build dashboards to identify trends.
  • Perform A/B testing on black box models based on test data.
  • Perform pruning and optimization of ML models for production.
  • Write scripts to test for discrepancies in data for training.

Skills Required -

  • Proficient in Probabilities, Algorithms, Data Structures, and Statistics.
  • Proficient in at least one of the following: Python, R, MATLAB, C++, C, Scala
  • Understand the central concepts of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and have undertaken at least one hobby/professional project individually.
  • Familiarity with Deep Learning model architectures like CNN, RNN, LSTM, GANS etc.
  • Ability to write well documented, efficient, and readable code with Tensorflow, Numpy, Pandas, PySpark, Keras/Pytorch/Theano.
  • Mastery with one of MySQL, PostGreSQL databases and expertise with SQL queries.
  • Familiarity with some of the following python libraries: OpenCV, PIL, scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Regex, Librosa, nltk, BeautifulSoup etc.
  • Ability to clearly understand and communicate key ideas and concepts, verbally, in tables/sheets, and written.
  • Preference for a well maintained GitHub/Kaggle, with innovative approaches of visualizing data and solving problems.
  • Familiarity with Jupyter, Google Colab, Datalab etc.
  • Can relate and think of data, requirement and AI models together.
Apply
